plot: The story takes place in a trading city Ert'Aria. Leicester Maycraft is an item engineer belonging to an adventurer guild "Oasis". One night, he is at a party with his friends to see a meteor stream on the rooftop of a chapel. One meteor grazes them and hits the steeple of the chapel. There he finds a secret room and a sleeping girl. The girl wakes up and says "You must be my father". The encounter with the mysterious girl brings an unexpected adventure to Leicester.
opening_theme: "Shiawase wa Tsuki yori Takaku" (シアワセは月より高く) by Aki Misato
"Yume no Preparation" (夢のpreparation) by Mai Goto, Ari Yunohara and Hiroki Yasumoto (ep 8)
ending_theme: "Mirai Kaikisen" (未来回帰線) by Miyuki Hashimoto (eps 1-8)
insert_song: "Kiyoraka na Chikai (清らかな誓い)" by Chelsea starring Asami Imai (ep 6)
"Mahō Soretomo Ai no Mahō? (魔法それとも愛の魔法？)" by Carrina starring Kimiko Koyama (ep 3)
"Mirakuru Mirai (みらくるみらい)" by Minette starring Mai Kadowaki (ep 5)
"Yume yo, Hirake! (夢よ、ひらけ！)" by Agnes starring Kaori Mizuhashi (ep 4)
